word:
Chap. 53 - To Mary White

                                                      W-77-1889 

                           Battle Creek, Mich. October 31, 1889 

Dear Mary: 
     Our meetings are crowded in thick and fast. We see in five o'clock meetings and in eight o'clock meetings many tokens for good. The testimonies are of altogether a different character than they have been in any conference we have had for some time. I do long for the work to go deep and I believe it is.
